name: Onion Baked Pork Chops
author: Karla Essner

ingredients.name: envelope Lipton dry onion soup mix

instructions: Combine dry soup mix with bread crumbs. Dip chops in egg, then bread crumb mixture, coating well. Place in lightly greased shal- low baking dish. In conventional oven, bake at 350 degrees turning once, for 1 hour or until tender. In microwave, microwave chops, uncovered at medium power for 40 minutes or until tender; rearranging once. Let stand covered for 10 minutes.
